about_the_game:
The heroine falls into a maze for some strange reason.
You will operate the heroine to survive in this maze for 30 days before you have a chance to escape.

During the day, you can go into the maze to collect the supplies you need to survive.
But you have to get back to the main base before dark!
The maze at night is unpredictable, and there will be scary monsters.

In the maze, you may experience several different, fairy-tale worlds.
There are many countries in this fairy world, such as the kingdom of playing cards, baboon country, steam country and so on.
Nations are at war with each other and the world is on the verge of collapse...
As the number of days you live increases, you will be able to travel to every country and discover the secrets hidden in every corner of the world.

In order to survive, you can build some weapons or defensive towers to ward off monsters.
However, I recommend building some traps.
Traps cooperate with each other, can form a platoon to contain monsters, causing higher damage.

This is a 2D style, survival and tower defense built survival game.
Combine dungeon and tower defense construction, become a trap master, and punch unexpected Combo.

You will operate the heroine to survive in this maze for 30 days before you have a chance to escape.

name: Maze and Fairy tale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel/AMD 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 512MB or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel/AMD 2.0+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 1GB or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This is a 2D style, survival and tower defense built survival game. Combine dungeon and tower defense construction, become a trap master, and punch unexpected Combo. The more days you survive, you will have the opportunity to travel through a complete fairy tale world.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
